sources.full: Songborne Species - Hell on High Water

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial with an Aquan dialect.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on yourself.

entries.name: Charmsong
entries: As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can use your voice to influence other creatures. The effect your voice has depends on the type of song you sing. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

items.name: Charming Melody
items.entry: Choose a number of targets equal to or lower than your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} that you can see within 60 feet of you. If those targets can hear you, they must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for one minute or until they take damage, become deaf, or you lose the ability to speak.

items.name: Siren's Shriek
items.entry: Each creature in a 15-foot Cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. When you reach 6th Level, the cone becomes a 30-foot Cone.
